summary: The Benefits that Endure for Lifetimes Of Service Act (BELO'S Act) amends the Federal Lands Recreation Enhancement Act to provide lifetime National Parks and Federal Recreational Lands Passes to family members of deceased members of the Armed Forces. Specifically, it targets survivors eligible for death gratuities under 10 U.S.C. 1475 or dependency and indemnity compensation under 38 U.S.C. Chapter 13.
